sect2.title: Dépendances d'installation de File
sect2.para: (Dernière vérification effectuée auprès de la version &file-depversion;.)
sect2.literallayout: Autoconf: autoconf, autoheader Automake: aclocal, automake Bash: sh Binutils: as, ld Diffutils: cmp Fileutils: chmod, install, ln, ls, mv, rm, touch Gcc: cc1, collect2, cpp0, gcc Grep: egrep, grep M4: m4 Make: make Gawk: gawk Sed: sed Sh-utils: echo, expr, hostname, sleep Texinfo: makeinfo Textutils: cat, tr
